articles.description: The chip maker is reportedly working on an Android-powered mobile system that resembles the wildly popular Nintendo Switch.
articles.content: With gaming more popular than ever because of the Covid-19 lockdowns, and next-generation systems in short supply, Qualcomm (ticker: QCOM) is reportedly working on its own console.Qualcomms system is… [+1686 chars]

articles.title: iQOO Z3 coming with 120Hz display and 55W fast-charging - Gizchina.com
articles.description: iQOO is gearing up to introduce its new iQOO Z3. The phone will have a 120Hz display, 55W fast-charging and a 64MP camera.
